```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(here)
mkdir(here('bcells'))
source!('~/tabula-muris/00_data_ingest/02_tissue_analysis_rmd/boilerplate.R')
```


```{r}
robjs = c('~/tabula-muris/00_data_ingest/11_global_robj/droplet_all.Robj',
          '~/tabula-muris/00_data_ingest/11_global_robj/FACS_all.Robj')

for (robj in robjs){
  load(robj)
  if (grep('droplet', robj)){
    tiss = tiss_droplet
    scale = 1e4
  } else {
    tiss = tiss_FACS
    scale = 1e6
  }

  bcell_ind = grepl('B cell', tiss@meta.data$cell_ontology_class)
  bcell_ontologies = unique(tiss@meta.data$cell_ontology_class[bcell_ind])
  bcell_ids = tiss@cell.names[bcell_ind]

  tiss_bcells = SubsetData(tiss, cells.use=bcell_ids)
  tiss_bcells = process_tissue(tiss_bcells)

  robj_basename = basename(robj)
  filanme = here('bcells', robj_basename)
  save()
}
```
